dsOverview.title: NCDC Western Northern Hemisphere Stratospheric Analyses, weekly Jan,Apr,Jul,Oct 1964-66

summary.p: The weekly stratospheric analyses of geopotential height and temperature in this dataset were produced from available radiosonde and rocketsonde data for the 5, 2, and 0.4 millibar levels. Grids are available for the months of January, April, July, and October from 1964 through 1966 and cover the western Northern Hemisphere from 140E longitude to 360E.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Altitude > Geopotential Height
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
